name: WineTemp
0:
”Alexa, open Wine Temp”
”Alexa, start Wine Temp”
”Alexa, launch Wine Temp”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wine temp
des:
Wine Temp gives you the ideal serving temperature for different types of wine. 

You can say:

"Alexa, open Wine Temp"
"Alexa, start Wine Temp"
"Alexa, launch Wine Temp"

Once in the skill ask about: red, white, merlot, champagne, pinot noir, and many more.
